elementSpec.desc: defines an association or hypertextual link among elements or passages, of some type not more precisely specifiable by other elements.
定義元素或段落之間的關連或超文字連結，其他元素無法將此連結類型作更詳細說明。

attDef.desc: specifies the identifiers of the elements or passages to be linked or associated.
標明被連結的元素或段落的識別符碼。
attDef.valDesc: two or more pointers (URIs), separated by white space
兩個或多個指標(URI)，中間用空白鍵隔開。

elementSpec.desc: defines a collection of associations or hypertextual links.
定義一群關連或超文字連結的集合。
contains any arbitrary component-level unit of text, acting as an anonymous container for phrase or inter level elements analogous to, but without the semantic baggage of, a paragraph.
包含文件中任何獨斷組織層次的單元，匿名收容類似一個段落、但不包含段落語義的字詞或中間層元素。

attDef.desc: specifies whether or not the block is complete.
標明區塊是否完全。

valItem.gloss: the block is incomplete
區塊不完全
either the block is complete, or no claim is made as to its completeness
區塊完全，或完全程度不明
the initial part of an incomplete block
不完全區塊的開始部分
a medial part of an incomplete block
不完全區塊的中間部分
the final part of an incomplete block
不完全區塊的結尾部分

elementSpec.desc: attaches an identifier to a point within a text, whether or not it corresponds with a textual element.
在文件中某一位置附上識別符碼，無論該位置是否符合一個文字性元素。
contains any arbitrary phrase-level unit of text (including other seg elements).
包含文件中任何獨斷字詞層次的單元(包括其他強制分割元素)。

attDef.desc: provides a sub-categorization of the segment marked.
提供所標記分割段落的次級分類。
attDef.valDesc: any string of characters.
任何字串。

elementSpec.desc: indicates a point in time either relative to other elements in the same timeline tag, or absolutely.
指出一個時間點，相對或絕對於同的時間進程標籤裡的其他元素。

attDef.desc: supplies an absolute value for the time.
提供一個絕對時間值。
attDef.valDesc: Times may be given in standard form, as specified in the Encoding Declarations section of the header.
時間可用標準格式來呈現，同於標頭裡編碼宣告部分所指定的情形。

attDef.desc: specifies the unit of time in which the interval value is expressed, if this is not inherited from the parent timeLine.
若沒有從父元素timeLine得到時間單位資訊，則在此指明屬性interval所使用的時間單位。

valItem.gloss: seconds
秒
milliseconds
毫秒
minutes
分
hours
時
days
日

attDef.desc: specifies the numeric portion of a time interval
指明時間區段中的數值部份
attDef.valDesc: a positive number, or the special value unknown.
一個正數，或是特殊值不明。

attDef.desc: identifies the reference point for determining the time of the current when element, which is obtained by adding the interval to the time of the reference point.
指出一個參照點，用來確定現有元素when的時間，可在參照點的時間內加入區段而取得。
attDef.valDesc: Should point to another when element in the same timeline.
應該連結到在同一個timeline裡的另一個元素when。

elementSpec.desc: provides a set of ordered points in time which can be linked to elements of a spoken text to create a temporal alignment of that text.
提供一組整齊的時間順序點，可與口說文本的元素相連結，以建立該文本的時間組序。

attDef.desc: designates the origin of the timeline, i.e. the time at which it begins.
標出時間進程的開頭，例如：開始時間。
attDef.valDesc: must point either to one of the when elements in its content, or to another timeline element.
必須連結到內容中的其中一個元素when，或者連結到另一個timeline元素。

attDef.desc: specifies the unit of time corresponding to the interval value of the timeline or of its constituent points in time.
指出符合時間進程屬性interval的屬性值或是符合其接續時間點的時間單位。

valItem.gloss: days
日
hours
時
minutes
分
seconds
秒
milliseconds
毫秒

attDef.desc: specifies the numeric portion of a time interval
指明時間區段中的數值部份
attDef.valDesc: a positive number, or one of the two special values irregular or regular.
一個正數，或是兩個特殊值不規則或規則的其中一個。

elementSpec.desc: identifies a possibly fragmented segment of text, by pointing at the possibly discontiguous elements which compose it.
標明文本中可能的不完整分割，連結到導致該狀況的可能不連接元素。

attDef.desc: specifies the identifiers of the elements or passages to be joined into a virtual element.
標明和一個虛擬元素相關聯的元素或段落的識別符碼。
attDef.valDesc: two or more pointers (URIs), separated by white space
一個或多個指標(URI)，中間用空白鍵隔開。

attDef.desc: specifies the name of an element which this aggregation may be understood to represent.
指出一個推斷該元素集合所代表的元素名稱。
attDef.valDesc: The generic identifier of an element in the current DTD.
在現有DTD中的元素通用識別符碼。

attDef.desc: indicates whether the targets to be joined include the entire element indicated (the entire subtree including its root), or just the children of the target (the branches of the subtree).
指出被相連結的目標是否包含所指元素的完整部份(完整樹狀圖包含根節點)，或是只有目標的子元素(樹狀分支部份)。

valItem.gloss: the rooted subtrees indicated by the targets attribute are joined, each subtree become a child of the virtual element created by the join
由屬性target所指明的具根節點的樹狀圖互相連結，每個樹狀圖獲得一個由連結所產生的虛擬元素的子元素。
the children of the subtrees indicated by the targets attribute become the children of the virtual element (i.e. the roots of the subtrees are discarded)
由屬性target所指明的樹狀圖的子元素成為虛擬元素的子元素(例如：樹狀圖的根節點被捨去)。

elementSpec.desc: groups a collection of join elements and possibly pointers.
匯集一群連結元素和可能指標。

attDef.desc: describes the result of the joins gathered in this collection.
描述在連結匯集的結果。
attDef.valDesc: supplies the default value for the result on each join included within the group.
提供在集合中每個元素join的屬性result的預設屬性值。

elementSpec.desc: identifies an alternation or a set of choices among elements or passages.
標明一個替換，或是元素或段落之間的不同選擇。

attDef.desc: specifies the identifiers of the alternative elements or passages.
標明替換元素或段落的識別符碼。
attDef.valDesc: Each value specified must be the same as that specified as value for an xml:id attribute for some other element in the current document.
任何標明的屬性值必須和在相同文件中其他元素所使用的屬性xml:id的屬性值相同。

attDef.desc: states whether the alternations gathered in this collection are exclusive or inclusive.
說明在此集合中的替換物件是唯一的或通用的。

valItem.gloss: indicates that the alternation is exclusive, i.e. that at most one of the alternatives occurs.
替換物件是唯一的，例如：最多只出現一個替換。
indicates that the alternation is not exclusive, i.e. that one or more of the alternatives occur.
替換物件不是唯一的，例如：出現一個或多個替換。

attDef.desc: If mode is excl, each weight states the probability that the corresponding alternative occurs. If mode is incl each weight states the probability that the corresponding alternative occurs given that at least one of the other alternatives occurs.
若屬性mode的屬性值是 excl，則每個weight皆表明相對應替換的可能性。若屬性mode的屬性值是 incl，則每個weight皆表明，在至少一個其他替換存在的前提下，相對應替換的可能性
attDef.valDesc: a whitespace-separated list of probability values in the range from 0 to 1.
可能值範圍從0到1的列表，中間用空白鍵隔開。

elementSpec.desc: groups a collection of alt elements and possibly pointers.
匯集一群替換元素和可能指標。

attDef.desc: states whether the alternations gathered in this collection are exclusive or inclusive.
說明在此集合中的替換物件是專有的或通用的。

valItem.gloss: indicates that the alternation is exclusive, i.e. that at most one of the alternatives occurs.
替換物件是專有的，例如：最多只出現一個替換。
indicates that the alternation is not exclusive, i.e. that one or more of the alternatives occur.
替換物件不是專有的，例如：出現一個或多個替換。

classSpec.desc: defines a set of attributes for hypertext and other linking, which are enabled for all elements when the additional tag set for linking is selected.
定義一組用於超文字連結及其他連結的屬性，當連結的附加標籤組被選擇時，這些屬性可用於所有元素。

attDef.desc: points to elements that correspond to the current element in some way.
連結到的元素在某方面符合現有元素。
attDef.valDesc: one or more URIs, separated by white space.
ㄧ個或多個URI，中間用空白鍵隔開。

attDef.desc: points to elements that are synchronous with the current element.
連結到的元素和現有元素同時出現。
attDef.valDesc: one or more URIs, separated by white space.
ㄧ個或多個URI，中間用空白鍵隔開。

attDef.desc: points to an element that is the same as the current element.
連結到的元素和現有元素相同。
attDef.valDesc: a URI.
一個URI。

attDef.desc: points to an element of which the current element is a copy.
現有元素是連結到的元素的複製本。
attDef.valDesc: a URI.
一個URI。

attDef.desc: points to the next element of a virtual aggregate of which the current element is part.
連結到現有元素所位於的虛擬集合的下一個元素。
attDef.valDesc: a URI.
一個URI。

attDef.desc: points to the previous element of a virtual aggregate of which the current element is part.
連結到現有元素所位於的虛擬集合的上一個元素。
attDef.valDesc: a URI.
一個URI。

attDef.desc: points to elements that are in exclusive alternation with the current element.
連結到的元素是現有元素的專有替換元素。
attDef.valDesc: one or more URIs, separated by white space.
ㄧ個或多個URI，中間用空白鍵隔開。

attDef.desc: selects one or more alternants; if one alternant is selected, the ambiguity or uncertainty is marked as resolved. If more than one alternant is selected, the degree of ambiguity or uncertainty is marked as reduced by the number of alternants not selected.
選擇一個或多個替換；若選擇一個替換，則疑惑或不明確被標記為以解決。若選擇一個以上的替換，則疑惑或不明確的程度因為未選擇的替換而被標記為減低。
attDef.valDesc: one or more URIs, separated by white space.
ㄧ個或多個URI，中間用空白鍵隔開。

classSpec.desc: defines a set of attributes used by all elements which point to other elements by means of one or more URI references.
定義一組所有和其他元素相連結的元素皆使用的屬性，連結是使用ㄧ個或多個URI參照。

attDef.desc: categorizes the pointer in some respect, using any convenient set of categories.
在某方面將指標分類，使用任何合宜的類別。
attDef.valDesc: Any string of XML name characters. The type should indicate the intended function of the pointer, or the rhetorical relationship between its source and target.
任何XML名稱字串。此類型應該指出該指標所預期的功能，或是來源及目標之間的修辭關係。

attDef.desc: specifies the intended meaning when the target of a pointer is itself a pointer.
若指標的目標本身為一個指標，則在此說明其用意。

valItem.gloss: if the element pointed to is itself a pointer, then the target of that pointer will be taken, and so on, until an element is found which is not a pointer.
若指向的元素本身是一個指標，則該指標的目標會被移除，依此類推，直到找到一個不是指標的元素。
if the element pointed to is itself a pointer, then its target (whether a pointer or not) is taken as the target of this pointer.
若指向的元素本身是一個指標，則該指標的目標(無論是不是指標)會被看做是這項指標的目標。
no further evaluation of targets is carried out beyond that needed to find the element specified in the pointer's target.
尋找指標的目標元素時，沒有對於目標進行不必須的延伸評估。

classSpec.desc: defines a set of attributes common to all elements which enclose groups of pointer elements.
所定義的一組屬性為所有包含指標元素群組的元素所共有。

attDef.desc: optionally specifies the identifiers of the elements within which all elements indicated by the contents of this element lie.
隨意標明元素的識別符碼，此元素內容所指明的元素皆包含在這些元素當中。
attDef.valDesc: a list of at least two generic identifier names, separated by whitespace.
一個列表包含至少兩種類別的識別名稱，中間用空白鍵隔開。

attDef.desc: describes the function of each of the values of the targets attribute of the enclosed link, join or alt tags.
描述每個link、join、或alt標籤當中的屬性targets的屬性值的功能。
attDef.valDesc: a list of at least two valid names, separated by whitespace.
至少兩個有效名稱的列表，中間用空白鍵隔開。
